articles.title: Report of Political Bureau of WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Report of Political Bureau of WPK Central Committee
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Jan. 23 released the following report:
					 The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee adopted a decision "On making it rule to hold meeting of secretaries of cells of the WPK" and made it public as follows:
					
					 The party cells are the grassroots level organizations of our party to directly organize and guide the life of its party members, main units linking the party and the masses with blood ties and important units to implement the party's line and policies.
					
					 Strengthening the party cells constitutes a main link in the chain efforts to enhance the capacity of the party in every way and increase the party's leadership function and role in the revolution and construction and a consistent policy adhered to by our party in party construction and party work.
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung organized grassroots level organizations for the first time in the history of party building of working class and successfully accomplished the cause of party founding by way of expanding and strengthening them. He, at the same time, wisely led the work for consolidating the party cells in every period and at each stage of the party and the developing revolution and increasing its role in every way.
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to strengthening the party cells, regarding it as a fundamental issue in strengthening the whole party. He convened the Short Course of Secretaries of the Party Cells from across the country in May Juche 80 (1991) and sent to it his historic letter "Let Us Strengthen Party Cells," clearly indicating the orientation and ways to turn all the party cells into those loyal to the party.
					
					 He also convened the Meetings of Secretaries of Party Cells in March Juche 83 (1994) and October Juche 96 (2007) in order to bring about a radical turn in strengthening and developing the party and carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation by firmly building all the party cells into vanguard organizations true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party and further enhancing their role. 
					
					 The dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward and developing the idea of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on building the party and their feats, specified the original idea and line of strengthening and developing the WPK into Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party which will be glorious forever. He took important steps for decisively raising the leadership ability and role of the party by strengthening all the party cells as demanded by the development of the party and revolution. He conferred on the secretaries of the party cells the valuable title of revolutionary soldier faithful to the party and scout who takes the lead in implementing the party's policies. He is wisely leading them to glorify the honor.
					
					 Today the party faces the sacred tasks to brilliantly accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation rallied in single mind behind Kim Jong Un under the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK decides as follows to make sure that the whole party is consolidated and a turning-point is made in building a thriving socialist nation by strengthening the party cells, basic organizations of the WPK and cornerstones propping it up, under the prevailing situation in which the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche is being waged on a new, higher stage: 
					
					1. The WPK will make it a rule to hold a meeting of secretaries of cells and convene it when necessary. 
					
					2. The meeting of secretaries of cells of the whole party to open on January 28, Juche 102 (2013) shall be called the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the WPK. 
					
					 The Short Course of Secretaries of Party Cells across the country held in May of Juche 80 (1991) shall be called the First Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the WPK, the Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Whole Party held in March of Juche 83 (1994) the Second Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the WPK and the Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Whole Party held in October of Juche 96 (2007) the Third Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the WPK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fabricating UN "Resolution" with Foreign Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fabricating UN "Resolution" with Foreign Forces
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released the following statement on Friday:
					 There took place another astonishing case. The U.S. and its followers cooked up a "resolution on tightening sanctions" at the UN Security Council by terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes an inter-continental ballistic missile launch.
					
					 The fabrication of "the resolution" this time represents the height of the hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK as it is the last-ditch efforts of the hostile forces displeased with the ever-increasing authority and national power of the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean puppet group of traitors took the lead in fabricating the "resolution".
					
					 When satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 of the DPRK lifted off in December last year, the group desperately took issue with it, talking about "provocation" and "blatant challenge" against the international community. It worked hard to see the UN apply additional "sanctions" against the DPRK, vociferating about "strong counteraction" and "tightened sanctions".
					
					 The minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade and other mandarins of the south Korean regime visited theU.S., Japan and other neighboring countries to discuss "close cooperation at the UN" and asked them for their active participation in the moves for tightening "sanctions against the north". Not content with this, the south Korean group unhesitatingly submitted a "proposal for additional sanctions against the north" to the UN.
					
					 It is the group which clamored for "independent additional sanctions" together with the U.S. and it is again the group which was the first to utter "welcome" and "implementation of the resolution" right after its fabrication at the UNSC.
					
					 The world knows no such hordes of traitors who worked with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces as the south Korean group.
					
					 The row kicked up by the group against the DPRK over its satellite launch is aimed to tarnish its image, save the face of the group that fell to the ground and deliver the anti-DPRK policy from its total bankruptcy.
					
					 The group salvaged wreckages of the DPRK's carrier rocket Unha-3 from waters of the West Sea and was stunned by the high level of its technology.
					
					 As fellow countrymen the group should have been pleased with the great event to be recorded specially in the national history spanning five thousand years, the event which fully demonstrated the dignity and might of the nation. Nevertheless, it behaved so foolishly. This shows it is betenoire bereft of an iota of reason as human beings.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are greatly infuriated by the fabrication of the UN "resolution" by the U.S. and its allies and the group's desperate efforts.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea vehemently rejects the UN "resolution" in the name of all the fellow countrymen, branding it as an unpardonable grave challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and the Korean people.
					
					 It, at the same time, strongly condemns the reckless behavior of the group taking the lead in faking up the UN "resolution" in league with foreign forces as the most despicable act of treachery and an unbearable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 In view of the prevailing grave situation the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea solemnly declares the following counter-measures against the south Korean puppet group, representing the towering anger and unanimous will of the army and the people of the DPRK and all other Koreans.
					
					1. Now that the south Korean puppet conservative group is more desperately kicking up a racket against the DPRK over its nuclear and missile issues with the U.S., there will be no more discussion on denuclearization between the north and the south in the future.
					
					 In this connection, we declare complete nullification of the "Joint Declaration on Denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula" adopted in 1992 and its total invalidity.
					
					 The joint declaration already proved a dead paper long ago due to the moves of the U.S. and the puppet group for a nuclear war against the north and their nuclear rackets against it. It is needless to say that there is no need for us to be bound to the declaration.
					
					2. As long as the south Korean puppet group of traitors persistently pursues a hostile policy toward the DPRK, we will never negotiate with anyone.
					
					 The historical lesson shows that there is nothing to be solved when meeting with those who pursue confrontation with the DPRK and this will only bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The group should not think about any dialogue with us as long as it sticks to the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					3. If the puppet group of traitors takes a direct part in the UN "sanctions," the DPRK will take strong physical counter-measures against it.
					
					 "Sanctions" mean a war and a declaration of war against us.
					
					 We have already declared that "we would react to provocation with immediate retaliatory blows and a war of aggression with a great war of justice for national reunification."
					
					 The group would be well advised to stop acting rashly, bearing in mind this warning served by us.
					
					 All our service personnel and people will never allow the reckless confrontation moves of the group.
					
					 Those who dare stand in the way of our just cause will never be able to escape deadly retaliatory blows.

articles.title: Korean Peninsula's Denuclearization Comes to End
articles.content:
Korean Peninsula's Denuclearization Becomes Impossible
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The January 23 statement, released by the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in response to the "resolution" adopted by the UN Security Council at the initiative of the United States, said the DPRK drew a final conclusion that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is impossible.
					 This has made invalid the September 19 Joint Statement, which was adopted at the six-party talks on the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality, signaling an end to the discussion on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is entirely attributable to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, which has been pursued before the nuclear issue in the Korean Peninsula came up.
					
					 The U.S., which divided Korea into two after the Second World War, refused even to call the DPRK by its official name, to say nothing of the establishment of diplomatic relations, while opening diplomatic ties with socialist countries in Eastern Europe different from it in ideology and social system. 
					
					 The DPRK joined the UN in Juche 80 (1991) and established diplomatic relations with many countries. But the U.S. still refuses to recognize it as a sovereign state with whom it should co-exist in the international community, regarding it as a target to be removed.
					
					 Such hostile policy of the U.S. is clearly represented in maintaining the state of truce in the Korean Peninsula for more than a half century while persistently posing military threats to the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean Armistice Agreement, concluded on July 27, 1953, was a transitional measure aimed at withdrawing all foreign troops from the Korean Peninsula and ensuring permanent peace there.
					
					 However, the U.S. intentionally chose to prolong the state of armistice.
					
					 In November 1953, it defined as its ultimate goal to prevent the spread of communism into south Korea by turning it into a military ally while maintaining the armistice regime until "pro-American unification" is achieved on the peninsula.
					
					 Accordingly, the U.S. deliberately ruptured the Geneva conference for a peaceful solution to the Korean issue in June 1954. It also turned down all peace proposals made by the DPRK government, including a proposal for conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and a proposal for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 Meanwhile it has hurled latest military hardware into south Korea, including nuclear weapons, and carried on DPRK-targeted joint military exercises for scores of years under various names in line with such war scenarios as "OPLAN 5029".
					
					 The U.S. has restricted trade with the DPRK and imposed all sorts of economic sanctions on it under the pretexts that the DPRK threatens regional stability and does not cooperate with the U.S. in its "anti-terrorism" efforts and that it is not a nation based on the market economy.
					
					 A few days ago, it cooked up a "resolution" over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes, calling for tightened sanctions against the country aimed at stifling its social system.
					
					 It even practiced live shell firing with the DPRK flag as a target and steered the move to destroy statues of Kim Il Sung, eternal president of the DPRK.
					
					 The facts show that force, not words, is needed to cope with the U.S. hostile policy and that it was quite right for the DPRK to take the road of Songun (military-first), the road of independence.
					
					 The DPRK has already risen to be a full-fledged nuclear state and the day was gone when the U.S. threatened the former with nukes. The DPRK's access to nukes was due to the constant threats of the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The self-defensive nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is instrumental to preventing a new war and ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK People Ready for All-out Action against U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK People Ready for All-out Action against U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission (NDC) of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Jan. 24 issued a statement declaring an all-out action against the United States after the adoption of the UNSC's recent "resolution".
					 The statement has enjoyed full support from all people of the country, including servicepersons. It also shows their will to turn out in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "I am satisfied with the statement stressing that settling accounts with the U.S. needs to be done with force, not with words as it regards jungle law as the rule of its survival. This fully reflects the KPA's will to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 Words do never work on the U.S. imperialists. I am eager to shower a fire on them at once."
					
					 Ko Kyu U, a teacher of University of National Economy, said:
					
					 "I can not but deride the meaningless UN 'resolution', which was adopted at the initiative of the U.S.
					
					 Such anti-DPRK campaign at the UN reminds me of 'rats' gathering in a fable. As rats can not hang a bell on the neck of a cat though they may play the whole gamut of tricks, any attempt can never block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 We will rise up in the all-out action to punish the U.S. and its followers now that they employ every conceivable means to stifle our country."

articles.title: Korean Youth Performed Big Feats in Defending Country and Building Thriving Nation Last Year
articles.content:
Korean Youth Performed Big Feats in Defending Country and Building Thriving Nation Last Year
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) ? The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent an autographic letter "Prosperous Tomorrow Will Be Brought Earlier by Dynamic Footsteps of Youth. Always Straight Forward, Following the Party!" on January 26 last year after reading a letter sent by young people.
					 Upon receiving his autographic letter, the young Koreans fully displayed their stamina in defending the country and building a prosperous country for the past one year.
					
					 Officials of the youth league, youth and students across the country prepared over 160 000 flowering trees of good species and planted them around statues and sunny portraits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and monuments to their immortality across the country.
					
					 Graduates from secondary schools in Kangwon Province petitioned to be allowed to join posts in the forefront areas. A great number of youth and students joined the Korean People's Army (KPA) in January last year.
					
					 More than 1.94 million young people petitioned to be allowed to join or rejoin the KPA when the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea committed a hideous provocative act against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Young scientists and technicians of the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, the first application satellite of the DPRK, thus contributing to successfully realizing the behest of leader Kim Jong Il. Their feats are recorded brilliantly in the history of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Youth scientific and technological march and technical innovation youth shock brigade movement have been waged actively. As a result, over 3 100 inventions and new technological innovation information including hundreds of IT goods were presented to the national youth scientific and technological achievements exhibition and a number of scientific and technological achievements have been introduced to the production.
					
					 On the occasion of the Youth Day last year, the members of the Paektusan Songun Youth Shock Brigade finished the construction of a main dam of power station No. 2.
					
					  The August 28 Youth Shock Brigade Management Bureau finished before schedule the construction of high-rise apartment houses and public service amenities in Changjon Street.
					
					 Young people who took part in over 20 key projects dedicated their wisdom and enthusiasm at construction sites.
					
					 More than 9 200 young people fulfilled ahead of schedule the 3-year, 2-year national economic plans while over 87 000 yearly national economic plans, when taking the country as a whole.
					
					  The youth workteam in Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province and the youth sub-workteam in Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province introduced a rotation production system and put the agricultural production on a scientific basis, bringing about good results.
					
					 Following their examples, more than 2 180 youth sub-workteams and youth workteams in different parts of the country spurred the agricultural production, doing their share in implementing the agricultural policy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Thanks to young people's warm patriotic enthusiasm, tens of thousands of hectares of forests were created in the country. 
					
					 The young people of the DPRK are straightly and dynamically advancing towards a final victory of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Prove Successful at Int'l Circus Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Prove Successful at Int'l Circus Festival
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats proved successful at the 37th Monte Carlo International Circus Festival.
					 Put on the stage of the festival held from January 17 to 22 in Monaco were at least 40 numbers presented by ace acrobats from 21 countries including the DPRK.
					
					 Silver prize and special prize went to the DPRK physical acrobatic feat "Trapeze Flight on Horizontal Bar" and special prize to its  "Rope Etude".

articles.title: Production Goes Up in Light Industrial Sector of DPRK
articles.content:
Production Goes Up in Light Industrial Sector of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Light industrial factories in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been in full operation from the outset of the year.
					 In January the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory and the Pyongyang Flour-Processing Factory have raised production twice as compared with the previous year, the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory and the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda Pop Mill 1.6 times and the Pyongyang Foodstuff Packing Materials Factory 1.5 times.
					
					 The Susongchon General Foodstuff Factory has fulfilled its daily production quota at 150 percent. The factory also made a big progress in upgrading the quality of soft drinks through a mass technological innovation movement.
					
					The Sinuiju Knitted Goods Factory has kept its production on a normal basis. It applied an advanced dying method and invented a new kind of seaming machine, thus topping the daily target by 20 percent.
					
					 Besides, production is soaring up at the Songyo Knitted Goods Factory and other knitting and textile mills across the country.

articles.title: Modern Medical Appliances Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Modern Medical Appliances Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Some kinds of medical appliances have been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Among them are ultrasonic abdominal examiner, electrocardiograph, electromyograph and electroencephalograph.
					
					 The appliances help ensure accuracy of diagnosis in a short time.
					
					 The electrocardiograph is useful in checking heart diseases, including cardioneurosis, myocardial infraction and myocarditis. This portable appliance is capable of sending diagnosis data to computer.
					
					 The electromyograph is used to correctly measure the situation of neuroparalysis.
					
					 Hwang Myong Song, chief engineer of the Pyongyang Electronic Medical Apparatuses Factory, told KCNA that the development of the appliances has paved a way to ensure medical checkup on a more scientific basis at local hospitals.

articles.title: "Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" Published
articles.content:
"Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" Published
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Book "Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in the DPRK.
					 The book was published for the first time on the occasion of the 60th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and its enlarged edition was brought out in Juche 92 (2003).
					
					 The new book has 12 chapters, 96 sections and epilog dealing with immortal revolutionary exploits of the President and his personality as a peerlessly great man.
					
					 The first four chapters cover the period from April 1912 to August 1945. They tell stories that the President pioneered the revolutionary cause of Juche and led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, achieving the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 The next four chapters cover the period from August 1945 to December 1960. They deal with the feats the President performed by successfully implementing the historic tasks for carrying out social revolution at two stages, waging the Fatherland Liberation War, conducting the postwar rehabilitation and construction and laying  foundations of socialism, and establishing the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK.
					
					 The last four chapters cover the period from January 1961 to July 1994. They deal with the immortal feats the President performed by successfully leading socialist construction of various phases and thereby building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence and fully demonstrating its dignity and might.

articles.title: "Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children" Popular with Schoolchildren
articles.content:
"Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children" Popular with Schoolchildren
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The "Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children" is now gaining popularity among schoolchildren in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Copies of the collection are stocked at the Grand People's Study House in Pyongyang and schoolchildren's libraries across the country.
					
					 Contained in the collection comprising 60 volumes are famous tales for children which have been told in the East and the West to teach the truth and lessons of life.
					
					 Sim Yong Suk, a librarian at the Schoolchildren's Library in Central District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "The library is nowadays crowded with schoolchildren on their winter vacation.
					
					 Most of them want to read the 'Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children', which is helpful to enriching common knowledge about folk traditions, literature and arts of different countries and nations."
					
					 Ri Il Hwan, a student of Pyongyang Ryongwang Secondary School, said:
					
					 "I've read book 'Gulliver's Travels' with deep interest. It is very popular among my fellows."
					
					 Nam Ye Ryong, a pupil of Kim Song Ju Primary School, said:
					
					 "I am reading book 'Swan Lake'. I hate wizard in the book."
					
					 The collection draws attention of many children as it helps them discern good and evil, right and wrong and beauty and ugly, cultivate enterprise and boldness and harbor hope and ambition.

articles.title: Bitter Cold Sweeps DPRK Again
articles.content:
Bitter Cold Sweeps DPRK Again
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Bitter cold is sweeping through all parts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea again, beginning on Thursday afternoon.
					 The lingering cold weather in the country, which started early in December last year, had lost its force from January 11, with the temperature getting higher than the average year on the 19th.
					
					 On January 22, the highest temperature in most of the west coastal areas was recorded as 6 to 8 degrees Celsius and in the northern inland area zero degree Celsius, 5 to 9 degrees C, higher than the average year. The lowest temperature was 0.1 degree C in Pyongyang, minus 1.5 degrees C in Phyongsong City and 1 degree C in Sariwon City.
					
					 On January 21, heavy snow and rain hit most of the west coastal areas and some areas of Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces, with 61 mm in Wonsan City, 29 mm in Kosong County and 28 mm in Chonnae County.
					
					 Such warm weather for several days was due to a cyclone that passed through the southern part of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 But the temperature is expected to drastically go down from the 25th to the 29th, affected by cold air that is coming to the peninsula from Siberia.
					
					 In the period the lowest temperature in the eastern and western areas of the country will stand at minus 18-15 degrees C and in the northern inland area at minus 26-22 degrees C.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of North HQ of Pomminryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of North HQ of Pomminryon 
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The cause of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) is sure to triumph as it is an invincible patriotic organization dynamically struggling in the van of the movement for national reunification in accordance with the will and wishes of all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article dedicated to the 22nd anniversary of the formation of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Pomminryon HQ was created on Jan. 25, Juche 80 (1991) as the north branch of Pomminryon in the wake of its formation.
					
					 The course covered by Pomminryon for more than 20 years represents a shining period in which it has strenuously waged a patriotic reunification movement, sharing the same breath with all fellow countrymen desirous of national reconciliation and unity and national reunification under the uplifted banner of the Three Charters for National Reunification and the north-south joint declarations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 There took place in the 1990s of the last century pan-national meetings which encouraged all Koreans to turn out in the struggle for national reunification and the June 15 era of reunification witnessed grand reunification festivals which fully demonstrated the will of the Korean nation for independent reunification. All these events were associated with the efforts of Pomminryon.
					
					 It has vigorously advanced the reunification movement, meeting the vicious challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad with the might of great national unity.
					
					 It has also roused compatriots from all walks of life at home and abroad to a nationwide struggle to support and defend the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and check and foil the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad going against the trend of the times.
					
					 It has successfully realized solidarity and alliance and joint actions of Koreans in the north and the south and abroad for national reunification, more firmly relying on the patriotic reunification forces and strengthening their organizations as the situation got complicated and acute. It, at the same time, has steered the movement for national reunification, bitterly condemning the U.S. and the south Korean anti-reunification forces for their rackets of confrontation with the DPRK. This is a manifestation of its firm will to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail with the concerted efforts of the Korean nation under the uplifted banner of the June 15 era of reunification despite any great difficulties and stern trials.
					
					 The Korean nation is highly proud of having Pomminryon, vanguard of the national reunification movement, and voices full support to its activities.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted Field Tactical Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted Field Tactical Drills
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The First Division of the south Korean puppet army announced it would start field tactical drills in different places of Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Jan. 28, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The war maneuvers will be staged under the simulated conditions of surprise preemptive strike at the DPRK three times till the end of February with huge forces, tanks, automatic artillery pieces and other offensive means involved.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is going reckless with the above-said war maneuvers as part of its moves for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party's Stance on Ssangyong Motors under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party's Stance on Ssangyong Motors under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions released a commentary on January 22 denouncing the "Saenuri Party" for opposing investigation into the state policy over the situation of Ssangyong Motors.
					 Although there are ever-growing voices demanding investigation, this has not properly been conducted due to the party's opposition, the commentary charged.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It is nothing but a trick that the "Saenuri Party" opposes such investigation, asserting there is no need for it under this or that pretext.
					
					 To conduct such investigation constitutes a basis for holding the "government" responsible for the above-said situation and taking measures to ensure that the people may not suffer any longer as it is a promise the ruling party made to them.
					
					 However, the party tries to leave the issue of holding the management side accountable for the situation to the court, the commentary noted, adding that the court had already lost its trust as it unilaterally favored the assertion of the management side.
					
					 What is urgent at present is to conduct an unbiased investigation to correctly clarify the reason behind the situation and improve the law and system related to layoff, it said.
					
					 It demanded the party comply with the demand for investigation and take the earliest possible measure for reinstating the discharged workers.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Recognize Government Employees Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Recognize Government Employees Union
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- 87 civic and social bodies in south Korea held a news conference in Seoul on Jan. 22 at which they urged  the puppet government to recognize the Government Employees Union and reinstate the fired employees.
					 The chairman of the union and others spoke there.
					
					 They accused the regime of refusing to accept the application for creating the union and suppressing it after labeling it an illegal one.
					
					 They deplored that more than 130 unionists were sacked for the mere reason that they voiced opposition to irregularities and corruption.
					
					 They said that nowhere in the world the legal status of the government employees unions are not recognized.
					
					 They urged the authorities to recognize the union and reinstate the unreasonably discharged unionists as early as possible.
					
					 The authorities should no longer be allowed to deprive the unionists of their rights, they stated, expressing the will to stage a dynamic action to have their issue settled.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Commemorated in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Commemorated in DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A Democratic Congo preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Kinshasa on Jan. 19.
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the period from Jan. 21 to Feb. 16 as a commemoration period and decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Political Party Leader of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Political Party Leader of DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- It is the bounden duty for the progressive parties, organizations and people of the world to significantly commemorate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Democratic Congo preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star on Jan. 19. 
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the immortal Juche idea into the most perfect idea guiding the era of independence and clearly indicated the road for the world revolutionary people to follow in their struggle for independence. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the unique Songun politics, frustrating the intensified moves of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK, firmly defending socialism and instilling conviction and courage into progressive humankind desirous of independence. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Under his leadership the cause of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Mexican Party Leader 
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, made public a statement on Jan. 18 hailing the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					 Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as important guidelines helping the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people vigorously advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, upholding the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he noted
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people will glorify the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and achieve successes in the efforts for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country in hearty response to the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people will work fresh miracles and make innovations in the efforts for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard and turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist country, holding aloft the slogan "Let us bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space!" 
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people, convinced that the entire Korean nation will remove confrontation between the north and the south and achieve peaceful reunification of the country without fail through a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification in the idea of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the New Year 2013. 
					
					 He sincerely wished the DPRK, homeland of Juche, prosperity.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded 
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Peruvian and Swiss organizations made public statements in support of the memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued on Jan. 14. 
					 The Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in a statement on Jan. 16 said that the "UN Command" in south Korea under the signboard of the UN is, in fact, the U.S. forces command in south Korea. The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. has not dissolved the "UN Command" since the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement. Its real intention is to justify the permanent presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 The Armistice Agreement should be replaced with a peace treaty for durable peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 We fully support the memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and strongly demand the immediate withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea. 
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Jan. 15 held that if the U.S. keeps maintaining the illegal "UN Command" and transforms it into a "multinational forces command", a new war may break out on the Korean Peninsula any moment. 
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its strong self-defence deterrence to cope with the U.S. hostile policy towards it, the statement said, demanding the dissolution of the illegal "UN Command" and the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Egyptian Figure Calls for Dissolution of "UN Command"
articles.content:
Egyptian Figure Calls for Dissolution of "UN Command"
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on Jan. 14 calling for the dissolution of the "UN Command". 
					 The statement vehemently denounced the U.S. recent moves to revive the "UN Command" according to its new defense strategy as dangerous moves to bring the dark clouds of war to the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to revive the "UN Command" in disregard of all the sincere efforts of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. Lurking behind this scenario is a sinister intention to transform the "UN Command" into a "multinational forces command" and use it for invading those countries disobedient to the U.S. in contingency. 
					
					 Whether the U.S. dissolves the "UN Command" or not is a touchstone showing whether it stands for world peace or increased constant tension. 
					
					 We supporters to the Korean people's desire for national reunification express full support and solidarity to their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop all the moves to perpetuate Korea's division and meet the just demand of the DPRK without delay. 
						]

articles.title: Publicada informacion del BP del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Publicada informacion del BP del CC del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publico el dia 23 la siguiente informacion:
					 El BP del CC del PTC aprobo la resolucion "Sobre la sistematizacion de la Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea" y la proclama como sigue:
					
					  Las celulas del partido son unidades basicas que organizan y dirigen directamente la militancia de los miembros del partido, vinculan las masas con el partido y materializan las lineas y politicas de esta organizacion.
					
					  La consolidacion de ellas es la clave para incrementar por todos los medios la combatividad del partido y elevar su funcion y papel directivos en la revolucion y la construccion. Esta orientacion la mantiene invariablemente el PTC en la construccion y las labores del mismo.
					
					  Por primera vez en la historia de construccion de los partidos de clase obrera, el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo primero la organizacion basica del partido y cumplio exitosamente la causa de fundacion del partido al ampliarla y fortalecerla. Ademas, en cada periodo y etapa del desarrollo del partido y la revolucion, condujo sabiamente las labores para consolidar las celulas del partido y elevar en todos los sentidos el papel de ellas.
					
					  Viendo esa labor como cuestion fundamental para fortalecer todo el partido, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presto profunda atencion al mismo quehacer.
					
					  En mayo del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche, convoco el cursillo de los secretarios de celula de todo el partido y envio el historico mensaje titulado "Fortalezcamos las celulas del Partido" aclarando el rumbo y remedios para convertir todas las celulas en las de fidelidad.
					
					  En marzo del 83 (1994) de la Era Juche y en octubre del 96 (2007) de la Era Juche, convoco las conferencias de los secretarios de celula del partido con el proposito de fortalecer todas las celulas como entidades vanguardistas, que apoyen fielmente la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, y elevar el papel de ellas. De esta manera, hizo producir un cambio radical en el desarrollo del partido y el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del Estado prospero socialista.
					
					  El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien continua excelentemente la idea y hazanas de los grandes Generalisimos en materia de la construccion del partido, presento la original idea y linea para fortalecer el PTC como eterna organizacion gloriosa de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. Tomo las medidas importantes para fortalecer todas las celulas conforme a la nueva demanda surgida en el desarrollo del partido y la revolucion y elevar asi la funcion y el papel directrices del partido. Otorgo a los secretarios de celula el titulo de soldados revolucionarios fieles al partido y patrullas que cumplen en la delantera las politicas del partido y les dirige sabiamente para que trabajaran conservando ese honor.
					
					  Hoy en dia, nuestro partido tiene la sagrada tarea de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion del Estado prospero socialista uniendose monoliticamente en torno a Kim Jong Un bajo la bandera del gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					  Para fortalecer todo el partido mediante la intensificacion de las celulas, piedras angulares del partido, y registrar un viraje trascendental en la construccion del Estado prospero socialista en estos tiempos en que se libra dinamicamente en la nueva etapa elevada la lucha por cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche, el BP del CC del PTC resolvio lo siguiente:
					
					1. Sistematizar la conferencia de los secretarios de celula del PTC y convocarla en los tiempos necesarios.
					
					2. La conferencia de los secretarios de celula de todo el partido, a convocar el 28 de enero del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche sera la IV conferencia de los secretarios de celula del PTC. 
					
					Seran oficializados como primera, segunda y tercera ediciones del mismo conclave el cursillo de los secretarios de celula de todo el partido, celebrado en mayo del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche, y las conferencias de los secretarios de celula de todo el partido, realizadas en marzo del 83 (1994) de la Era Juche y en octubre del 96 (2007) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: Desnuclearizacion de Peninsula Coreana anulada por politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Desnuclearizacion de Peninsula Coreana anulada por politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- La cancilleria coreana hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion de denuncia a la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU inventada por la instigacion de Estados Unidos, en la cual saco la conclusion de que sera imposible la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					De esta manera, fueron anuladas la declaracion conjunta del 9 de septiembre acordada en las conversaciones a 6 bandas basada en el principio de respeto a la soberania y la igualdad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Todos los hechos se engendraron debido a la recrudescente politica hostil anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del imperio yanqui.
					
					En la actualidad, los estadounidenses y otras personas del mundo, nacidos despues de la guerra, no conocen bien el hecho de que el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana se produjo por la susodicha politica.
					
					La politica anti-RPDC del imperio se practico antes de originarse el problema nuclear.
					
					Despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, EE.UU. dividio a Corea en dos partes y nego llamar correctamente el nombre oficial de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sin establecer las relaciones diplomaticas con esta aunque lo hizo con la ex Union Sovietica y otros paises socialistas de la Europa Oriental diferentes en los ideales y regimenes.
					
					La RPDC ingreso en 1991 en la ONU y establecio las relaciones diplomaticas con otros numerosos paises. Sin embargo, el imperio la considero no como contraparte a coexistir en la misma sociedad internacional sino como objeto de eliminar.
					
					La politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio se ha manifestado en el hecho de que continua  amenazando militarmente a la RPDC manteniendo mas de medio siglo el estado armisticio en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El acuerdo de armisticio de Corea, acordado en 27 de julio de 1953, fue la medida transitoria para retirar de la peninsula todos los ejercitos extranjeros y asegurar la paz  duradera.
					
					Pero, el imperio opto intencionalmente el camino de prolongar el estado de armisticio.
					
					EE.UU. determino en noviembre de 1953 como meta final sobre Corea mantener el sistema de armisticio hasta que se logre la "unificacion proyanqui" y evitar la "transformacion comunista" de toda Corea al convertir al Sur de Corea en su "aliado militar".
					
					Rompio premeditadamente en junio de 1954 la reunion de Ginebra para la solucion pacifica del problema de Corea y nego todos los proyectos propuestos por la RPDC tales como concertar el tratado de paz RPDC-EE.UU., la conversacion a 4 bandas por estructurar en la Peninsula Coreana el duradero sistema de paz y sustituir el acuerdo de armisticio por las conversaciones de paz.
					
					Introdujo en el territorio surcoreano modernos armamentos incluyendo las armas nucleares, trazo los planes de guerra coreana como "OPLAN-5029" tomando la RPDC como enemigo y despliega durante varios decenios los simulacros conjuntos para su realizacion.
					
					Restringe el comercio con la RPDC e intensifica la sancion economica bajo el vistoso rotulo de que la RPDC "amenaza" la estabilidad de la region, no coopera con el "esfuerzo antiterrorista" de EE.UU.
					
					Ultimamente, invento hasta la "resolucion de sanciones" para aplastar el regimen de la RPDC acusando hasta el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos.
					
					Perpetro sin vacilacion alguna el tiroteo contra la bandera de la RPDC y comete los actos provocativos de manipular el complot para destruir las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					La realidad muestra que se debe responder a la politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio no con las palabras sino con las fuerzas y que es justo mil veces el camino de independencia y del Songun optado por nosotros.
					
					La RPDC ya se ha convertido en el digno pais poseedor de armas nuclear y desaparecio para siempre la epoca en que el imperio nos amenazaba con armas atomicas.
					
					El pueblo coreano llego a tenerlas porque el imperio, mayor poseedor de armas nuclear en el mundo, se desespera para derrumbar la RPDC.
					
					El disuasivo nuclear independiente de la RPDC es arma omnipotente para prevenir la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y defender fidedignamente la paz y la estabilidad.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a autoridades surcoreanas sumadas a aprobacion  de la "resolucion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a autoridades surcoreanas sumadas a aprobacion  de la "resolucion" anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 25 la siguiente declaracion: 
					Bajo la instigacion de Estados Unidos y sus satelites, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU volvio a aprobar la "resolucion de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificando el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos del disparo de misil balistico intercontinental. 
					
					Esto es una desesperacion de las fuerzas hostiles que no desean el elevado prestigio de la RPDC y el fortalecimiento del poderio estatal de esta y forma parte del climax de la politica hostil y la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC. 
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que la banda titere surcoreana estuvo al frente de la fabricacion de la presente "resolucion". 
					
					En diciembre pasado la RPDC lanzo exitosamente la unidad no. 2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3", ocasion en la cual los titeres surcoreanos lo acusaron de "provocacion" y "desafio frontal" a la sociedad internacional y se desesperaron para que la ONU aprobara la resolucion de "sancion" anti-RPDC hablando de la "fuerte contramedida" y "sancion intransigente". 
					
					El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio y otras autoridades surcoreanas visitaron a sus amos norteamericano y japones y otros paises vecinos para conspirar la "estrecha colaboracion en la ONU" y les rogo aplicar la "sancion anti-RPDC" y sometio atrevidamente a la consideracion de la ONU el "proyecto de sancion anti-RPDC". 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos actuaron freneticamente junto con EE.UU. hablando de las "independientes medidas adicionales de sancion". Y cuando fue aprobada en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la "resolucion" anti-RPDC, lo aplaudio antes que nadie e insiste en "observar la resolucion". 
					
					En este mundo no hay otras fuerzas como la banda traidora surcoreana que se entrega con frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida en connivencia con las fuerza extranjeras. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos cuestionan el lanzamiento de la unidad no. 2 del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3" con el fin de manchar la imagen de la RPDC, mantener su prestigio deshonrado y seguir la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC en el fracaso total. 
					
					Esta vez, ellos temen por el alto nivel tecnico de la RPDC tras averiguar los restos del cohete transportador "Unha-3" caidos en el Mar Oeste. 
					
					La "resolucion" de la ONU inventada por EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites y las maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos provocan una gran indignacion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria califica de un grave desafio intolerable a la dignidad y soberania de la RPDC y al pueblo coreano la "resolucion" de la ONU aprobada por las fuerzas hostiles acusando de nuestro lanzamiento legitimo del satelite con fines pacificos, y la rechaza en nombre de toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, denuncia el proceder imprudente de la banda titere, que actuo freneticamente en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras por aprobar esa "resolucion", como crimen antinacional mas grosero y una provocacion imperdonable a la parte connacional.
					
					Con respecto a la situacion grave, el CRPP aclara las siguientes contramedidas a la banda titere del Sur de Corea, reflejando la gran indignacion y la unanime voluntad de los militares y civiles de la RPDC y los demas integrantes de la nacion:
					
					1. Dado que la banda conservador surcoreana recurre mas que nunca junto con EE.UU. a la campana nuclear y de misiles anti-RPDC, no habra nunca en el futuro entre ambas partes coreanas el debate sobre la desnuclearizacion. 
					
					Con respecto a esto, declaramos la invalidez total de la "Declaracion conjunta sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana" aprobada en 1992. 
					
					Ese documento quedo en letra muerta ya hace mucho tiempo por las maniobras de guerra nuclear y la campana nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere, razon por la cual no tenemos la necesidad de restringirse por ello. 
					
					2. Mientras que la banda traidora surcoreana sigue recurriendo a la politica hostil anti- RPDC, no nos trataremos con nadie.
					
					Como ensena la leccion historica, el tratamiento con los perseguidores del enfrentamiento anti-RPDC empeorara mas las relaciones intercoreanas sin resolver nada.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben pensar en conversar con nosotros antes de renunciar su politica de confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					3. En el caso de que la banda traidora surcoreana se incorpore directamente en la "sancion" de la ONU, se tomaran las fuertes contramedidas fisicas. 
					
					La "sancion" es precisamente la guerra y la declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ya hemos declarado que "responderemos a la provocacion con el inmediato ataque de represalia, y a la guerra de agresion con la justa guerra por la reunificacion de la patria". 
					
					La banda titere debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente nuestra advertencia. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos no perdonaran jamas sus imprudentes maniobras conflictivas. 
					
					Los que se atrevan a atentar nuestra justa causa, no podran evadir nuestra fuerte venganza y el golpe demoledor.

articles.title: Acrobatas de RPDC logran exitos en Festival Internacional de Circo de Monte Carlo
articles.content:
Acrobatas de RPDC logran exitos en Festival Internacional de Circo de Monte Carlo
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Los acrobatas coreanos alcanzaron exitos en el 37o Festival Internacional de Circo de Monte Carlo.
					  En la escena del festival, efectuado en Monaco desde el dia 17 hasta el 22, se pusieron mas de 40 piezas de 21 paises incluyendo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El premio de plata y el especial fueron otorgados al acrobatismo corporal de Corea "Vuelo en la barra fija" y el especial a la "Acrobacia con cuerda".
